rate_limiting.purpose: Evitar sobrecarga e respeitar limites da OpenAI API

unit_data.title: Unidade Hotel reservations and check-i...
unit_data.context: Hotel reservations and check-in procedures. Learning how to book rooms, ask for amenities, and handle check-in/check-out processes in English.

items.example: I have a reservation under the name John Smith.
We booked a double room for our stay.
You can do the check-in at the front desk.
Here is your room key.
The bathroom is equipped with a shower and a bathtub.
Check-out is at 11 AM.
Breakfast is served from 7 to 10 AM.
Wi-Fi is available in all rooms.
Please go to the reception to pick up your key.
You can leave your luggage at the reception.
The elevator is to your right.
Our room is on the fifth floor.
I would like to book a single room, please.
items.definition: solteiro (referindo-se a um quarto para uma pessoa)

items.example: We need a double room for two nights.
items.definition: duplo (referindo-se a um quarto para duas pessoas)

Incluir padrões de pronunciação no conteúdo
